synopsis.text: While safeguarding a yakuza leader on a luxurious cruise ship, the skilled samurai Goemon Ishikawa finds himself in a whirlwind of chaos when a formidable assassin, known as the "Ghost of Bermuda," emerges with the intent to eliminate the renowned thief Lupin, who coincidentally is planning to steal from the very same ship. With the yakuza boss falling victim to the ensuing turmoil, Goemon's sense of honor is challenged, compelling him to seek vengeance. To triumph over this seemingly invincible foe, Goemon must refine his abilities to their utmost limits. Fortunately, he's not alone in his quest, as he receives assistance from none other than Lupin and Jigen. Brace yourself for a thrilling adventure as Goemon confronts his most daunting adversary yet, blending traditional samurai values with the unpredictable world of modern crime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
